alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 30 at 2:06PM PST until January 31 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stehekin, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Expect winter travel across Stevens Pass on Highway 2. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches Sunday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
